Dogs could potentially explore new areas and heights that they would not be able to reach on foot. They could soar above treetops, chase birds through the sky, and even catch fish in mid-air.
Dogs could become aerial search and rescue dogs, assisting in finding lost people or animals in hard-to-reach areas.
Dogs could perform aerial tricks and stunts, similar to what humans do withers anders. They could even participate in aerial sports such as dog racing or dog ballooning.
Dogs could potentially have an advantage in hunting, as they could fly over their prey and swoop down to catch it.
Dogs could become aerial drones, equipped with cameras and other sensors to gather data and information for scientific research, military operations, or other purposes.
